text: The lawn bowls competition at the 1970 British Commonwealth Games took place in Edinburgh, Scotland from 16-25 July 1970. Lawn bowls returned to the Commonwealth Games following the exclusion of the event in the 1966 British Empire and Commonwealth Games because Jamaica had insufficient bowling greens. ==Medallists==
